Set/Get the NMEA protocol configuration. See section NMEA Protocol Configuration for adetailed description of the configuration effects on NMEA output.

column7: 0x41: NMEA version 4.10x40: NMEA version 4.00x23: NMEA version 2.30x21: NMEA version 2.1
Maximum Number of SVs to report per TalkerId.0: unlimited8: 8 SVs12: 12 SVs16: 16 SVs
Filters out satellites based on their GNSS. If abitfield is enabled, the corresponding satelliteswill be not output. (see graphic below)

Configures the display of satellites that do nothave an NMEA-defined value.Note: this does not apply to satellites with anunknown ID.0: Strict - Satellites are not output1: Extended - Use proprietary numbering (seeSatellite numbering)
